description:
Fetches and displays mentions of the current user in a user-friendly format, ensuring seamless integration with the PostsContainer for a unified experience.

@component

handleCloseModal.description: Function used to handle the Closing of the Edit profile modal, so it doesn't appear when needed

openModal.description: The state of the mentions modal, if false then it's not shown else it's shown

description:
Fetches, renders, and manages a comprehensive list of notifications, integrating user profiles and pagination for seamless viewing.

@component

handleCloseModal.description: Function used to handle the Closing of the Edit profile modal, so it doesn't appear when needed

openModal.description: The state of the notifications modal, if false then it's not shown else it's shown

description:
Renders individual notifications with informative icons, text, dates, and notifier details, providing clear visual cues and navigation to relevant profiles.

@component

text.description: The text content of the notification

date.description: The date and time of the notification

notifier.description: Information about the notifier, if applicable

description:
Renders a user-friendly placeholder when no notifications are present, providing clear guidance and a link to learn more about verified accounts.

@component

Serves as the central hub for notifications, offering a seamless navigation experience with clear structure and optional widgets for customization.

@component

Manages the display of notifications, adapting content based on type and loading state, and rendering placeholders when appropriate.

@component

list.description: The list of notifications to display

type.description: The type of notifications to display (e.g., "verified", "mentions")

feedRef.description: A ref object to attach to the container for the notification feed

loading.description: Indicates whether notifications are currently loading

description:
Renders a placeholder with clear guidance when no notifications are present, encouraging exploration and engagement with verified accounts.

@component

open.description: Controls whether the popup is open or closed

handleClick.description: Function called when the notification content is clicked

handleClose.description: Function used to handle the closing of the popup

description:
Captures and presents notifications specifically from verified accounts, ensuring users stay informed about important updates and actions.

@component

Displays a visually engaging placeholder when no verified notifications are present, encouraging exploration and engagement with verified accounts.

@component
